\w Is|strong="H1931"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w slave|strong="H5650"\w*? \w Is|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w born|strong="H3211"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w slavery|strong="H5650"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* captive?

“\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* say, ‘\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w am|strong="H1980"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*. \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w Baals|strong="H1168"\w*’? \w See|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w valley|strong="H1516"\w*. \w Know|strong="H3045"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*. \w You|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w swift|strong="H7031"\w* \w dromedary|strong="H1072"\w* \w traversing|strong="H8308"\w* \w her|strong="H7200"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*,
